definition: the fleshy red crest on the head of the domestic fowl and other gallinaceous birds
details:
noun
- the fleshy red crest on the head of the domestic fowl and other gallinaceous birds
= synonyms: coxcomb
- a cap worn by court jesters
= synonyms: coxcomb
- a conceited dandy who is overly impressed by his own accomplishments
= synonyms: coxcomb
- garden annual with featherlike spikes of red or yellow flowers
= synonyms: common cockscomb
